name: K1EHO
comment:
https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/205106518/stanley-w-klock

https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/hartfordcourant/name/stanley-klock-obituary?id=18262743

Stanley KLOCK Obituary KLOCK, Stanley W.
Mr. Stanley W. Klock, 73 died April 24, 2013, in Mesa, AZ. Mr. Klock was born in Manchester on Nov. 5, 1939. He lived in Manchester during his younger years then relocated to Cheshire, before moving to Warren, ME in the late 1980s and then to Mesa, AZ in the late 1990s. Stanley attended the University of Hartford receiving a Bachelor of Science degree in electrical engineering prior to being employed by the Bristol Company in Waterbury. Stanley, K1EHO, was very active in the ham radio community often volunteering in times of natural disasters. In recent years Stanley was very active in the Coast Guard Reserve assisting the Coast Guard with their homeland security efforts. Survivors include his wife of six years, Mary Klock; son's Dexter and Douglas and five grandchildren, Nathaniel, Shelby, Tanner, Sheridan and Dexter; and brother Peter Klock. Stanley was preceded in death by his son, Stanley Winfield Klock Jr. (Brothie) and his brother Stephen Klock.
A memorial service will be held at Holmes-Watkins Funeral Home, 400 Main St., Manchester, CT 06040, 860-643-2441 on May 12, 2013 at 2 p.m. Memorial contributions can be made to your local SPCA as Stanley was an avid dog lover.

Published by Hartford Courant on May 8, 2013.

CT ARES will hold a CT ARES DMR Net every Sunday at 8:30 PM following the CT ARES SM/SEC Net.

That is carried by all of the CT-ARES DMR Network repeaters.
